name: Carol Coral's: OPEN THE DOOR
description:
CAROL CORAL'S: OPEN THE DOOR

Carol Coral's room mate locked her in their room. Someone is knocking the door, the mistery deepens: Who is behind? The Police? A mad doctor? Brad Pitt??? If you want to know you must OPEN THE DOOR.

---

If you loved Lucas Arts games and miss them, this is your game.

If you like ridiculous arguments on stories, this is your game.

If you want to laugh about how bad I translated this, you know... I'm sorry.

The graphics, the music and programming (with the Visionaire Studio help) are made by only one person, me, Pilastrum. This is my first Graphic Adventure Game, so if you want to congratulate me, ask me something, kill me or whatever, contact me by mail: trumroom@gmail.com

---- Languages: English and Spanish

THERE IS A WALLPAPER ON THE DOWNLOAD FOR FREE!
